message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects a fair advantage for me as the first proposer.
Alice, your offer was a bit too advantageous for you. Let's be fair, this split recognizes your first-mover advantage but is more equitable.
Bob, time is running out and we both lose if this drags on. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to secure a slight advantage.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We need to settle this now. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
